website_summaries.verdict: This 22-inch hedge trimmer is said to cut through shrub overgrowth like butter.
pros: Uses 2 ampere hour 24V lithium-Ion battery that is compatible with indoor and outdoor tools in the Greenworks line
180-degree rotating rear handle lets you adjust to multiple cutting angles
Aluminum rail cover for storage protects blade

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent cutting tool
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent cutting tool, with a battery that can go the distance. I have a lot of hedge to cut. My old battery operated cutter couldn't handle larger woody stems; required 3 charged batteries for a day's work; and had a hand grip that was uncomfortable for me. Battery charging took at least 8 hrs. With this new cutter, I can charge the battery quickly and knock out the trimming. The grip is comfortable and adjustable for both man and woman. Highly recommend the tool. Excellent
customer_reviews.author: MEO

customer_reviews.title: Slow but Excellent service
customer_reviews.text: One small part was missing from the box. This was the blade cover. I thought that was an important safety item for when the tool is "dormant". I called the 800 number and the wait was very long but I finally got someone who directed me to another person. Another very long wait. My help, Chelsea was very apologetic. She listened to me, got the message right the first time and after ANOTHER very long wait she finished up and the part is on the way to me. Good for Chelsea, but not so good for Greenworks.
customer_reviews.author: Peter F.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, works great!
customer_reviews.text: I tossed my heavy 15 YO Craftsman corded trimmer. This Greenworks unit is lightweight and I love it. It does not kill my arms (female) and zips right thru my projects. I have the GW two speed blower and also the GW weedwacker and only one battery--it just takes some planning to make sure I have enuff battery juice to do what I need to do--or I can get another battery. It works fine for my needs and I recommend the above three products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, easy to use and does a great job.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this hedge cutter. The swivel handle makes it so much easier and it cuts through things like cutting through butter. Not too heavy either. I have a hedge cutter that is corded and my property is about 1/3 of an acre so carting that corded thing around was not the easiest thing and I can't tell you how many times I accidentally cut through the cord. I will purchase this brand again if I need other tools. It came with a charged battery so five minutes after I had it out of the box I was trimming and cutting. I love this tool
customer_reviews.author: Kate KenworthyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Customer Service on Malfunctioning Battery
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item with the intent of using it when the weather permitted; we had an unfortunately long, wet spring. When I finally charged up the battery and started out trimming, the battery did not hold a charge at all. I barely made it through one small hedge before the trimmer stopped working. I attempted to re-charge the battery, and it would not hold a charge. I called Amazon to report this issue, and requested a replacement battery. The Amazon representative informed me that the window had closed for returns, and that they would contact the manufacturer and get back to me. This never happened. This is a very expensive paperweight, one I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: After Waiting TWO WEEKS (As a PRIME Member) to Receive It And It Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: Waited TWO WEEKS as a PRIME member. Opened bow, charged battery, installed batter....nothing. Removed battery, reinstalled in charger. Got green light (charge complete), reinstalled battery, pulled trigger....nothing. Repeated this process 3 times with same results. Piece of crap. NEVER buy anything that says "eco". Sick and tired of getting crap from Amazon. Follow-up. One of the connectors on the battery were bent, not allowing it to slide into the groove on the edges. I SLOWLY repositioned the connected (for fear of breaking it) and SLOWLY reinstated it. It worked. Now I just hope the connector on the battery does crack/break. That would render it useless. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: T. Watters

customer_reviews.title: Love this! It gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It gets the job done, is lightweight, and the battery lasts for hours. What more could you want? Powered by 24V Lithium-Ion Battery and compatible with both indoor and outdoor tools--includes 2Ah Battery and Charger Innovative 180 degree rotating rear handle to provide easy trimming at multiple angles with wrap around auxiliary handle for user comfort 22-Inch dual action steel blade for optimal performance, aluminum rail cover included for safe storage and transportation 5/8-Inch cutting capacity gets through all your bushes and hedges with greater performance Compatible with GreenWorks G-24 24V Lithium-Ion Battery Models 29842 and 29852 and Charger Model 29862
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: So happy with all of my Greenworks yard tools
customer_reviews.text: I have a mower, blower and trimmer. I love them all. I wanted an extra battery and when looking it up I found I can the hedge cutter for just twenty five dollars more than the battery by itself. I'm a big fan of Greenworks. Their products have made maintaining my yard a simple and fun. My house urban with a small yard. I love not having to deal with gas, oil or extension cords.
customer_reviews.author: S. Farrell

customer_reviews.title: excellent tool
customer_reviews.text: got this yesterday.. and took it out to cut hedges right away... this is an excellent trimmer.. good balanced weight , and cut through my hedge like a hot knife through butter. .. smooth as silk.. and the feature of the turning handle to accommodate up and down cutting makes this an easy trimmer to handle.. a wow moment .. so , yup . I would buy this again.. and by the way this is not a paid review .. it's just me telling it like it is..
customer_reviews.author: Paul F. Macleod

customer_reviews.title: Greenworks for my works
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Greenworks yard tool. I have clippers and weed eater to go along with these trimmers. They all use the 24V battery so I can work all day by using one while the other charges. These batteries have excellent life and I very rarely run out of power during a job. The quality and flexibility of these tools is very good. They were all nice values, and they make short work of my yard chores. High recommend Greenworks products based on my personal experience with them.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Jim

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Trimmer
customer_reviews.text: I'm trimming/ shaping two boxwoods 3' x 4' and a large 8' long x 6' high x 4' deep Yew hedge, every year. This trimmer gobbles through these with power and precision. I didn't realize it when I purchased it, but the handle can unlock and rotate 90 degrees to accommodate the size and position of the material being trimmed. Battery lasted for the entire job, the trimmer was lightweight and well balanced, and is 100X better than my B&D trimmer. I love this trimmer, reduces the time, effort and fatigue required to trim the shrubs in MY yard. Would recommend and would by again, it is a remarkably fantastic ergonomic design.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: easy to use to cut shrubs
customer_reviews.text: This is a game changer, it's light weight, easy to use to cut shrubs, and best of all no cord to slow you down. The portability saves lots of time.
customer_reviews.author: Megabrain1000

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: I like the portability, weight and no cord . Works fine and battery lasts about as long as I do tackling an assortment of hedges and some holly plants intent on taking over the county. However, the only reason not to give it a five, is that despite suggestions by GreenWorks, the battery does not work on any other GW tools. Takes a while to figure this out. No help from GreenWorks as E mails are not answered and neither are phone messages and calling them at 8 AM EDT and put on eternal waiting does not result in a response other than auto generated E mails that affect nothing..
customer_reviews.author: jackc

customer_reviews.title: Great trimmer and great value
customer_reviews.text: This hedge trimmer does a fantastic job for me. It has lots of power. Lightweight. I like the swivel handle. It helps for larger bushes and awkward cuts and it helps when putting the trimmer away on a nail on the wall. I am enjoying this product. It cuts way better, cleaner cuts, and is more powerful that my last black and decker unit.
customer_reviews.author: kevcam

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete
customer_reviews.text: I give this a very low review. I purchased this to use this past weekend and it arrived on time "Prime 2 Day". I opened it to charge the battery and guess what? No Battery, No Charger. I called the vendor and they will send it out snail mail and I will get it in 7-10 business days. I will be fair and review it again once I get the battery and charger.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Parent

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: I have two sets of gasoline trimmers and didn't hold out much hope for how this battery operated set would work. I have lot's of hedges around my pool and front flower beds to keep trimmed in the summer. The gasoline trimmers are heavy and loud, but they do a great job. I tried this battery powered set out this morning and wow! Not as powerful as the gasoline trimmers but the job got done around the pool in 45 mins and they are light as a feather compared to the gasoline set. I also did not have to wear ear plugs. Extremely happy. I hope the quality holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Nice product with a lousy fit for the battery
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive the hedge trimmer. I charged the battery and lo and behold it doesn't sit well in the cradle and constantly comes loose. I have to keep a piece of cardboard jammed into it in order for the trimmer to work. The same thing happened with Greenworks leaf blower. Thankfully, Greenworks grass trimmer with the battery works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis L. Page

customer_reviews.title: How easy it is to use, no difficulties
customer_reviews.text: This hedger works so smooth and easy, it cut the time I have to cut down the bushel of vines on my fence from 30 minutes to just 5 minutes and was so easy to use I have disabilities in both of my hands and my left wrist has a limited use and I was able to use this with no problem. Thank You
customer_reviews.author: Debbie D. Tiemann

customer_reviews.title: No Need To Drag That Cord Around EVER AGAIN...
customer_reviews.text: My first Greenworks tool was the 24v string trimmer; I got that with its battery and charger, and then found out that they make a whole line of garden gadgets that use the same battery, so I got this Hedge Trimmer. It has worked very well for all my hedge trimming needs; it isn't quite as powerful as my old corded plug in model, but it still does a great job, and I don't have to drag that cord around with my everywhere. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: George Sawyn

customer_reviews.title: Relatively light and easy to handle.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, a good trimmer that won't wear you out using it. Just be sure that there is no wire, fencing, etc., hidden in any brush or bushes you trim. The blades are not very high strength steel and will bend and jam easily if you run into anything metal. The trimmer then becomes useless unless you have the tools to straighten the blades - which I have done a couple of times.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kent Miller

customer_reviews.title: The safety lock broke after a few weeks leaving me with a dangerous tool. Almost cut my finger off!
customer_reviews.text: The safety lock broke after a few weeks leaving me with a dangerous tool. Other than that I've been really happy with these clippers. Good battery life, Very sharp, which is why I'm upset about the safety lock failing so quickly. I almost cut my finger off because I wasn't expecting it to turn on when I simply picked it up.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cordless trimmer
customer_reviews.text: Had a corded craftsman trimmer. I must of chewed through at least 4 extension cables. This trimmer is awesome. I have used it 3 times so far to trim 4 medium sized bushes amd 2 shrubs. Sharp, durable, and lightweight. Only charged it once so far. Just as powerful as the craftsman. However it is cordless. Which is what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Schwaby

customer_reviews.title: WHOW what a trimmer
customer_reviews.text: This is the 4th Greenworks tool that I own. My other hedge trimmer quit working, as I have other Greenworks products and really like them it was a chinch that my next hedge trimmer was gonna be a Greenworks also. I’ve already used it and it’s a animal on triming....fine product
customer_reviews.author: geno

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for all of those smaller jobs that add up in the yard when landscaping is ignored too long. Lightweight but very strong, so easy to use, and often. No more letting things go - just pick up and get the work done quickly. Great for anyone to use. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Care - Share

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with performance.
customer_reviews.text: Better than my old corded electric trimmer. Blade will take a slightly larger branch and it cuts great. I have several GreenWorks tools and I love them all. I do wish that the battery was the same for all GreenWorks tools, I don't care to have two different chargers. But, that not really a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, battery life and will cut any branch!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd pair I’ve bought! My neighbor trims all my hedges for free and I just bought these thinking when his old heavy electric ones are to hard for him to work with he could try mine? He loved them so much he told the whole neighborhood and everybody has bought them! So I bought him his own pair for being such a dear soul doing my yard free! He loves them very much!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic hedge trimmer
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item to trim property hedges: lining the driveway, near the lawn, etc. Wasn't sure the battery would hold due to the amount of work that needed to be done. The battery lasted and lasted. The trimmer did an amazing job slicing through easy areas as well as the tougher spots. Could manage the trimmer to create rounded corners and box trim cuts as well. Easy and quick. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 1 acre lot.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my 1 acre home. My gardener moved to Texas and let my yard go for about 3 months. My bushes and trees got out of hand. These worked excellent to clean up my entire yard. All my bushes are now trimmed. It only took one charge. This is a powerful tool and the charge lasts a long time. I recommend this to anyone with a lot of bushes to trim. I like that the battery can be swapped out with a replacement one (not included) if you purchase additional batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Philip J Jang

customer_reviews.title: I cut the cord**Should have long ago
customer_reviews.text: I used it for hedge trimming about 10 to 15 minutes of run time. These new lithium ion batteries hold a charge for a long time. Still on original charge after 2 uses, did not loose cutting power yet. Well worth the price even if I just get 1 summer season growth in South Florida.
customer_reviews.author: Gort

customer_reviews.title: DOA
customer_reviews.text: I received it today and charged the battery fully and the hedge trimmer is dead. Poor quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Agro

customer_reviews.title: This is a Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Hedgers a arrived in a nice packages to protect from touching blades. I opened and used the product and it worked great. it is light weight and rotating handle makes it very easy on the wrist. Cuts very well. I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Jcool_ace

customer_reviews.title: Very useful to keep garden in shape
customer_reviews.text: I already have a Greenworks chain saw and wanted to reuse the battery on the hedge trimmer to save money. This was a good deal and value for money. It is easy to use and helps keep plants in control and shape
customer_reviews.author: Master Blaster

customer_reviews.title: battery doesn't hold charge! Or charge fully!!
customer_reviews.text: battery does not charge!! It charged up to one battery bar life and wouldn't charge anymore.. Had it on the charger for 8 days never charged anymore.. Didn't even get to cut my bushes one time. Feel ripped off
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: You don’t have to worry about cutting the power cord! :)
customer_reviews.text: Great for around the house/homeowner... lightweight and plenty of battery life. No need to worry about cutting the power cord
customer_reviews.author: funkymom

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Totally delighted with this product. Finally had it with my old corded trimmer and accidentally cutting the extension cord and decided to get the Greenworks and so happy I did. It charges quickly and provides enough run time to complete the job. Works well and the swivel head makes trimming ground cover that creeps into paths a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Marc D. Newman

customer_reviews.title: Well the product i assume is just fine but...
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't come with the battery and charger which cost more than the unit itself.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Have used another brand before & this is way lighter! Light weight, easy to maneuver & great battery life. Came fast & good price!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Battery & Charger doesn't fit older GreenWorks items !
customer_reviews.text: Battery & Charger doesn't fit / Work With older GreenWorks items ! Aluminum rail cover Was NOT Included, needed for safe storage !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Kite

customer_reviews.title: Battery power hedge clipper
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Finally enjoy using a hedge clipper. Don’t have to worry about dragging 100’s of feet of electric cord around or shorting the cord out after clipping it.
customer_reviews.author: anthony zuccarini

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturers quality check (labeled) didn't meet expectations
customer_reviews.text: The product did not work out of the box. Called manufacturer, no luck. Called Amazon to replace and got great service. To replace immediately.
customer_reviews.author: G Word

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: The battery lasted only 7 minutes after a full charge. Called the company and was put on hold till I hung up after holding for an hour. Returned the Item
customer_reviews.author: CARMINE AUDITORE

customer_reviews.title: Did the job!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for price. Lightweight, held the charge quite well, and did a good job on the hedges. Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Take2

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cordless Hedge trimmer
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Exceeds expectations with long lasting battery, exceptional performance, and ease of use! Highly recommend to anyone, even for large jobs too!
customer_reviews.author: William C Staley

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the purchase as this trimmer. It is light weight and very easy to use it. Two thumbs UP!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ali Z. Khan

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product.
customer_reviews.text: Big piece of junk. Arrived with a faulty battery thst would not charge. The box was so old thst it looked like it sat in a warehouse fir a decade.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Handles nicely, and cuts well.
customer_reviews.text: Best hedge trimmer I have ever had! The trimmer is weighted nicely, so the battery doesn’t make it hard to use. I am a not young female, and can handle this trimmer with ease. Not having to haul a cord around makes it super easy.
customer_reviews.author: janetB

customer_reviews.title: Just a great machine!
customer_reviews.text: WOW..... everyone should have one or these machines. Especially if you do your own yard maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Verrall

customer_reviews.title: Handy for quick small jobs
customer_reviews.text: Excellent price and great for smaller jobs - I like the twist handle making it more comfortable for horizontal and verticle trimming
customer_reviews.author: Ron W

customer_reviews.title: nice product
customer_reviews.text: worked right out of the box. Battery life seems pretty decent, fast recharge. so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this hedge trimmer
customer_reviews.text: this thing is awesome...I trimmed 8 hedges in no time. I'm so pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Fre

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Works good. Light weight. Only thing would be i would have exepcted a cover for the blades. That would have got this a 5 start.
customer_reviews.author: sandeep s.

customer_reviews.title: Most  made of all  plastic don't think they could handle heavy work
customer_reviews.text: Very good easy to handle, I have purchased 4 other items of the same brand
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Don’t trust the review for this product.
customer_reviews.text: The bad battery after using few times and coss more than the tool. Waste money for this brand. Never try this brand again
customer_reviews.author: vu minh le

customer_reviews.title: Good clipper
customer_reviews.text: I like the Greenworks products. Not the heavy weights of some of the products, but light in weight for small jobs
customer_reviews.author: R. Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: porduct review
customer_reviews.text: never got a chance to use the product because I purchased two different items form the company but they each needed a different type of battery...so i returned them both. I was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Danou1

customer_reviews.title: Easy to maneuver and light weight
customer_reviews.text: I charged it up and was able to trim all the bushes in my yard! It was easy to handle and I didn’t have to worry about accidentally cutting the cord. Lightweight for a hedge trimmer and easy to maneuver. Works wonderfully!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool for someone that cannot hold heavy items for very long. I love the fact I don't have to worry about a cord and the battery charges very fast. Since my husband is disabled, I like tools that I can use without maximum effort.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette Latarewicz

customer_reviews.title: Does a greatjob
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, yet powerful Does a great job. The battery can. Be used with other Greenworks products, which is an added plus.
customer_reviews.author: Gae O.

customer_reviews.title: Great garden tool!
customer_reviews.text: So handy and easy to use. Just wish it was a little lighter, but understand it is a long blade, and it must have a battery, so not unexpected. Still love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mary C.

customer_reviews.title: works beautifully
customer_reviews.text: Just used first time on hedges and it is great.
customer_reviews.author: TimSTER

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Does the job! Lightweight and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Parker

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my small bushes and branches in my little garden
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: awesome hedge trimmer.
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use and can cut through stuff for quite a long time. Got my backyard done super quick(35-40 minutes) and it still had battery life left to it. It takes getting used to with the swivel handle for better angles but other than that it is light enough to use at shoulder height and not get exhausted.
customer_reviews.author: Zachariah Ruggiero

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Received item. Charger doesn't work. Appears to be made of cheap flimsy plastic. Made in china.will never buy this brand ever again
customer_reviews.author: Average Consumer 123

customer_reviews.title: Long Lasting Battery
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with the purchase. The battery lasts a long time. The unit is lightweight but handles all my hedges just fine. It came in handy trimming the christmas tree.
customer_reviews.author: James O. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: The ability to rotate handle is an excellent feature and cuts great too
customer_reviews.author: budb5

customer_reviews.title: I like not having to drag a electric cord behind me
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. It seems to work as promised. I only used it for a few minutes on light cutting bushes. I like not having to drag a electric cord behind me. The batter doesn't add much weight, a big plus for me.
customer_reviews.author: Richie G

customer_reviews.title: Great light duty trimmer
customer_reviews.text: It’s light and cuts well. I really appreciate its portability. Battery life seems good and charging time short. Only reason for 4 stars is the short time I’ve had it.
customer_reviews.author: John Ahrens

customer_reviews.title: Great Cordless Trimmer
customer_reviews.text: Trimmer met all my expectations. Would not have a problem recommending this as an outstanding battery oowered trimmer.
customer_reviews.author: John Russell

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Works better than expected with the battery. Trimmed multiple bushes on a single charge with no issues. Can’t go wrong for < $40. Really nice not having a cord
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this to complement my same brand leaf blower. Have not had much opportunity to use but what I’ve had it works great, 1/3 the way of my old gas powered clippers
customer_reviews.author: gary

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive
customer_reviews.text: Works great, lots of power. Battery life is amazing. Cuts through larger than expected shrubs.
customer_reviews.author: J M

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for light trimming
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for the few hedges around my property. Easy to use, very little noise, and earth-friendly. Probably not powerful enough for tough or extremely large hedges.
customer_reviews.author: Barney1

customer_reviews.title: Great trimmer, horrible Battery.
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you buy a second battery, the first only last 30 minuets if your lucky.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Tool
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Greenworks purchase (have the chain saw). Long battery life -- I trimmed a 40 foot long, six foot high hedge with battery to spare. I am very pleased with these tools. No problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: M. Clarida

customer_reviews.title: But me you will love it
customer_reviews.text: Rotates by a simple button to allow easy trimming by any angle
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and charge fully in about an hour
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and charge fully in about an hour. More convenient to use without the hassle of fuel or electric cord.
customer_reviews.author: Ray &.

customer_reviews.title: It did just fine for two hundred blueberry plants
customer_reviews.text: Mine is used for light duty. It did just fine for two hundred blueberry plants. I like these products. I have their weed trimmer and blower.
customer_reviews.author: Duane Starrenburg

customer_reviews.title: Good Trimmer Combo
customer_reviews.text: Great tool works well and not too heavy to lift when on a ladder. I’m 75 and have no problem using it.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for taming the shrubs around our yard!
customer_reviews.text: Solid tool to help us tame the shrubs. So far battery life and cutting power has been good to tackle hedges and ivy around our yard. Rotating handle is a nice touch. Comes with guard for blade.
customer_reviews.author: Richard S

customer_reviews.title: Good tool to have if you got a garden
customer_reviews.text: It is same as pic and my husband liked, He said it is easy to use and handle. Thanks Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Melba

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what i needed & ordered. It's does the ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what i needed & ordered. It's does the job. very light in weight, approx (1) one hr of battery life.
customer_reviews.author: M.Whyte23

customer_reviews.title: Great power - low cost!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, will this baby cut! This was such a surprise - great battery power and cutting through hedges/small branches with ease! Job was over before I knew it!
customer_reviews.author: TexasTaxMan

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Having only used this once, I can only say that it worked great. The swivel aspect is a big plus, not heavy, probably a little more powerful than I thought it might be.
customer_reviews.author: DaP

customer_reviews.title: Simply amazing
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely phenomenal, I was blown away by the performance and strength of this .. I’m a landscaper and it is a very useful and reliable hedge trimmer .. lightweight with ingenious innovations applied
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great little trimmer
customer_reviews.text: Much stronger than anticipated, battery has a good life between charges, shaped 8' to 10' shrubs with ease, would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tarheel

customer_reviews.title: Did good for me with no problems
customer_reviews.text: cleared weeds from under my mobile home on blocksdid not take down hard stemmed weeds
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Bruess

customer_reviews.title: Hedge Trimmer
customer_reviews.text: Product works as expected. Battery charges as claimed. Instruction booklet badly/poorly written, but product is OK.
customer_reviews.author: elm

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Everything works great but mine didn’t came with the aluminum rail cover.
customer_reviews.author: FatChupacabras

customer_reviews.title: Run the battery down to nothing before fully charging it.Then it will keep the charge
customer_reviews.text: Battery wouldn't hold charger first so I called and was told to Run the battery down to nothing before fully charging it. Then it will keep the charge. it worked fine after that. I am keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: Z-Man

customer_reviews.title: clean up or just keeping your shrubs in shape & looking good! oh did I mention the blades
customer_reviews.text: They were every thing I expected & beyond! I am an ex. fla. Landscaper of many years,these Green works hedge trimmers are light- weight,quiet and powerful enough for any Home improvement,clean up or just keeping your shrubs in shape & looking good! oh did I mention the blades? They are sharp!! good quality product. bravo!!

customer_reviews.title: light weight and dependable
customer_reviews.text: Good yard care tool at reasonable price for cordless hedge trimmer. So far GREENWORKS products are very dependable.

customer_reviews.text: Powerful, lightweight, easy to handle. This is one of my favorite tools. Don’t hesitate to buy this hedge trimmer!

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, but not featherweight.
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty small and wimpy, but it was a little heavy and awkward for me. I put it away for a kind visitor some day.

product_meta.title: Greenworks 22-Inch 24V Cordless Hedge Trimmer, 2.0 AH Battery Included 22232
product_meta.description: Size:2Ah Battery and Charger| Style:Old VersionGreenWorks G-24 System offers versatility with a range of tools to choose from to get the job done with outdoor and indoor tools for all your DIY Projects. Whether it is getting the deck completed or getting your yard in pristine shape, the G-24 System has a tool for every project. From trimmers, chainsaw, pole saw and sweepers to drills, compressors and handheld circular saws, this system is quickly becoming the most versatile system for the suburban home. Compatible Battery and Charger Models include, Model 29842 and 29862. All GreenWorks Tools are backed with a 4 year warranty, the lithium-ion batteries are backed with a 2 year warranty. GreenWorks 22232 G24 Lithium-ion Cordless 22 inch Hedge Trimmer with 2.0AH Battery and Charger.
feature_bullets: Powered by 24V Lithium-Ion Battery and compatible with both indoor and outdoor tools--includes 2Ah Battery and Charger
Innovative 180 degree rotating rear handle to provide easy trimming at multiple angles with wrap around auxiliary handle for user comfort
22-Inch dual action steel blade for optimal performance, aluminum rail cover included for safe storage and transportation
5/8-Inch cutting capacity gets through all your bushes and hedges with greater performance
Compatible with GreenWorks G-24 24V Lithium-Ion Battery Models 29842 and 29852 and Charger Model 29862

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars554 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
